items.title: Add a "graph-only" mode (hide other widgets)
Install as a linux-vst
items.body: Since it compiles a linux-vst (lxvst), installs it as such.

items.title: Do not build LADSPA
items.body:
_following #64_

Since there is no way to compile and use it in a LADSPA format, no need to build so.

items.title: Mouse up can get discarded by setCursorPos()
Implement mirroring of the graph when in unipolar mode
bulle-aide ( hint-bubble-windows )
items.body:
Une bulle d'aide lorsqu'on positionne la souris au dessus des éléments de l'IGU, et qui explique à quoi servent les éléments pour :

- les 3 boutons PRE, WET, et POST
- le bouton-bascule uni/bi
- le sélecteur de suréchantillonnage
- le bouton-coche "center"
- les 2 ronds blancs initiaux en haut à droite et en bas à gauche
- le cercle rose initial au centre
- les autres ronds blancs et cercles roses que l'on peut ajouter

Ça peut paraître évident pour certains, mais il faut penser aux débutants de chez débutants aussi.

items.title: réduire la taille minimale de l'IGU (reduce the minimal GUI size)
items.body: La taille minimum de l'IGU est trop grande pour le peu d'infos qu'il peut y avoir, ça pourrait être vraiment bien de pouvoir la réduire.

items.title: Bouton de réinitialisation / reset button
items.body:
Comme discuté sur IRC. Posé ici pour ne pas oublier.
Un bouton de réinitialisation du graphique serait super utile.

items.title: Update Makefile (remove LADSPA install)
items.body: Since there is no way to compile it as a LADSPA, it avoids make install to rumble.

items.title: Add system-wide config file
Switches don't get updated on parameter change
Make it so that edges don't flash when removing a vertex from the graph
items.body: It's annoying. Some color transition between normal and focused color could help.

items.title: Jack build of plugin has high cpu usage when idle
Use a custom WolfWidget instead of NanoWidget
items.body: For instance, pretty much all widgets would benefit from having a onMouseEnter / onMouseLeave event.

items.title: Refactor GraphWidget / GraphNode code
items.body: It's very confusing as a whole. There are lots of coordinates conversions going on.

items.title: Smaller pixel threshold for turning oversampling wheel in opposite direction
Investigate for potential off-by-one error in Win32 mouse cursor manipulation
items.body: Either in setCursorPos or clipCursor. See cursor warping in NanoKnob.

items.title: Implement right-click menu
items.body: Needed for https://github.com/pdesaulniers/wolf-shaper/issues/11

items.title: Fix odd resizing behavior when window intersects with sides of screen
items.body:
Resizing the window into the corner of the screen causes the window to grow very fast.

The Windows build of the plugin doesn't seem to have this issue.

items.title: Proper skin for widgets
items.body: Red rectangles aren't very interesting :)

items.title: Add filters
Add some way to switch between linear and log in the graph
Change name to Wolf Shaper everywhere
items.body: Or find a better name.

items.title: Add a status bar
items.body:
Add a status bar at the bottom of the UI which displays:

- The Wolf Plugins logo
- The name of the parameter under the mouse pointer
- The description of the parameter under the mouse pointer
- The value of the parameter under the mouse pointer

Crude mockup:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23723605/110658371-a2688f80-818f-11eb-8f85-fa29e85d4fcd.png)


Related issues:
https://github.com/wolf-plugins/wolf-shaper/issues/78
https://github.com/wolf-plugins/wolf-shaper/issues/128 (units could be shown in the status bar)
https://github.com/wolf-plugins/wolf-shaper/issues/67 (the issue asked for tooltips, but I think we can document the parameters in the status bar instead)
https://github.com/wolf-plugins/wolf-shaper/issues/105 (we could easily display the plugin version in the status bar when no control is being hovered by the mouse)

items.title: Add flag for setting config path at compile time
Remember size of window
Make UI open faster
Fix flickering on resize
Create Linux packages for the plugin
Fix silence on state change on Windows
Fix blank oversampling rectangle on Windows and Mac
Some parametres become default on saving-loading (VST)
items.body:
pre-gain, wet, post-gain, oversampling while vertexes save just fine
Bitwig 1.3.15, vst version

items.title: Fix DSSI version
Add the ability to switch between multiple graph presets (and morph between them)
Fix knob getting stuck sometimes
Add some labels to describe the widgets
items.body: We'll need some good-looking fonts that are free to use.

items.title: Multiband distortion??
Find some ways to make the plugin more unique
items.body:
It's too similar to Fruity WaveShaper.

Here are some ideas:
https://github.com/pdesaulniers/spoonie-waveshaper/issues/19
https://github.com/pdesaulniers/spoonie-waveshaper/issues/20
https://github.com/pdesaulniers/spoonie-waveshaper/issues/34

items.title: Deal with window losing focus while node is held
items.body:
Related to https://github.com/pdesaulniers/spoonie-waveshaper/issues/10

The cursor is trapped inside the window and the node stays grabbed.

items.title: Figure out why the text doesn't get rendered on the oversample wheel
Cursor gets stuck at corners of screen when bending a curve or turning a wheel / knob if the window is partially outside of screen
Fix "audioMasterAutomate called from unknown source"
Don't clip graph line on sides of the graph
Fix update rate issues in some hosts
items.body: For example, the UI feels very unresponsive in Ardour.

items.title: Graph is frozen when mouse down on graph and mouse up on reset button
Change appearance of graph node when held
items.body: Make the node bigger, change its color, etc.

items.title: Add In/Out labels
Add a pencil tool for adding many vertices quickly?
Find a better name for the plugin??
Add some way to manipulate many graph nodes at the same time??
items.body: Bend +/- on graph vertices, or add some way to manipulate the tension of all the curves using a knob... Would that be useful?

items.title: Midi learn on graph nodes??
DPF should be a git submodule
Bend the curves using the mouse wheel
Input that goes beyond 1.0f should not be left untouched
Fix tension handles getting rendered on top of the vertices
Fix graph lines getting larger when vertical
Slow down the volume indicator's animation
Add a reset button
Add more curve types
Proper mouse cursor manipulation
Better-looking graph lines
items.body: I don't really like how the graph's function is drawn using two lines stacked on top of each other.

items.title: Better color scheme for UI
Add some cool animations to the UI
items.body: Color lerp animation on vertex/edge focus, make widgets grow on mouse hover, etc

items.title: Figure out how to get pretty gradients with NanoVG / OpenGL
items.body: Large and subtle gradients seem to have some banding issues??

items.title: Change color of tension handle when edge is focused
UI should be resizable
items.body:
A resize handle would be nice.

Not sure if I can somehow get native window manager resizes for the LV2 version of the plugin.

items.title: Implement bipolar mode
Implement oversampling
Add some NanoWidgets for controlling the plugin's parameters
items.body:
I need to implement the following NanoWidgets:

- [x] NanoSwitch
- [x] NanoButton
- [x] NanoWheel
- [x] NanoKnob
